text: I muli hua di daa gi daha a Saul, gei God ga haga gila aga a David di nadau king. Deenei laa di mee a God ne helekai ai i mee: ‘Au gu gidee bolo David tama daane a Jesse, la go tagadilinga daane dela e hiihai ginai Au, taane dela e hai nia mee huogodoo ala e hiihai ginai Au.’13.22 1 Samuel 13.14; 16.12; Pisalem 89.20
